cn.title: 关于比特派暂停 ZEC 充提业务的公告

message.data: 根据 ZEC 官方消息，ZEC 将在区块高度419200发生硬分叉。为此比特派预计将在香港时间10月28日9：30暂停 ZEC 的发币业务，期间收币不受影响。待 ZEC 硬分叉稳定后，我们会在第一时间恢复，具体时间将以公告另行通知。暂停期间为此带来的不便，敬请谅解！

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Announcement on the Suspension of ZEC Withdrawal and Deposit Service

message.data: According to ZEC official announcement, ZEC will have a hard fork at block height 419200. Hence, Bitpie will suspend ZEC's withdrawal and deposit service at 9:30 a.m. on October 28th (Hong Kong time). When the ZEC hard fork is completed and runs stable, we will resume the service immediately, the specific time will be informed as an announcement.
We are sorry for the inconvenience caused during the suspension period.

Find us on
